        [console_scripts]
        configtree = configtree.script:main

        [configtree.conv]
        json = configtree.conv:to_json
        shell = configtree.conv:to_shell

        [configtree.source]
        .json = configtree.source:from_json
        .yaml = configtree.source:from_yaml
        .yml = configtree.source:from_yaml
